channel.description: Recent content in Services on IT-Premium the premium support for IT services

item.title: Workplace and Standard Software Support Service: Overview
item.description:
The workplace and standard software (SW) support service ensures the stable operation of operating systems and office applications. We provide professional assistance in troubleshooting, installing, and reinstalling software. Discover how our support benefits businesses and individual users.

Which Software Do We Support?

Our team handles the following versions of standard software:

  • Windows Operating Systems:
    • Microsoft Windows
    • Microsoft Windows Server
  • Microsoft Office Suite:
    • Microsoft Office
    • Microsoft Office 365

These versions remain popular among users, and we guarantee their seamless performance.

item.title: Everything You Need to Know About IT Audit: How to Optimize Your IT Infrastructure
item.description:
In today’s fast-paced technological world, businesses must stay competitive. One key tool to achieve this is an IT audit. This service evaluates your information infrastructure, identifies weaknesses, and offers ways to improve it. In this article, we’ll explain what an IT audit is, why it’s essential, and how it can benefit your company.

What is an IT Audit?

An IT audit is a comprehensive review of a company’s information systems, including hardware, software, network infrastructure, data security, and compliance with standards. The goal is to assess the efficiency of IT processes, identify risks, and provide recommendations for improvement.

item.title: BAS Platform Support: Professional Business Assistance
item.description:
We provide professional support services for the BAS (former 1C) Platform, ensuring stable operation of your information system. Our experts are ready to promptly respond to technical incidents and provide real-time quality support.

Service Levels and Response Times

To meet various business needs, we offer three service levels:

Platinum Support Level

  • Response time: 30 minutes
  • Resolution time: up to 8 hours
  • Maximum priority ticket processing

Gold Support Level

  • Response time: 1 hour
  • Resolution time: up to 12 hours
  • Enhanced priority ticket processing

Classic Support Level
